{"result":"/* Version 3.0.3 */

/* Constants
border color : #252525
default background transparency: 25,25,25, 0.8
greyish white txt color: #b8b8b8
white txt color: #ddd
hover white color: #ededed
red txt color: #ff6666
red background color: #915252
red hover color: #c17272
link color: #167ac6
cool blue: #89abcd
slightly colder blue: #6592be
*/

/* Current Progress
Youtube Basics: 95% (footer needs updating)
Front Page: 100%
Sub Page: 100%
History: 95% (Make it gridlike or keep it like this?)
Watch Page: 100%
All Comments Page: 95% (gridlike?)
Music Page: 100%
Other Playlist: 100%
Search Page: 100%
Browse Channels: 100%
Manage Subs: 95% (get rid of white buttons, but is ok for now)
My Channel: 100%
Watch Later Page: 100%
Self Playlists: 100%
Upload: 80% (Looks right but haven't tested with an actual video.  White buttons)
Creator Studio & Dashboard+ others: 15% (Lots of stuff to do, just broken at this point)
Settings Page: 75% (super white background, change)
*/

body {
background: url("https://images8.alphacoders.com/693/693782.jpg") no-repeat fixed center center !important;
-webkit-background-size: cover !important;
-moz-background-size: cover !important;

background-size: cover !important;
